*[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31134484- ''Arris SB6190 (Intel Puma 6 / MaxLinear)'' on ''' DSLReports''']
===[[Intel Puma]] 6/6MG (Media Gateway) chipsets=== *'''[[Arris]]''': [[Arris SB6190]], [[Arris TM1602A]], [[Arris TM1602G]] :[[Arris TG1642]], [[Arris DG1642]], [[Arris DG1660A]], [[Arris DG1670A]] (/ACT) :[[Arris TG1662A]], [[Arris TG1662G]], [[Arris TG1662S]], [[Arris DG1662G]] :[[Arris TG1672A]], [[Arris TG1672G]], [[Arris TG1682G]], [[Arris MG2402G/CT]] :[[Arris DG2460A]], [[Arris DG2470A]], [[Arris TG2472G]], [[Arris TG2492]] ::''(Virgin Media Hub 3)''
*'''[[AVM]]''': [[AVM FRITZ!Box 6460]], [[AVM FRITZ!Box 6490]] *'''[[Cisco]]''': [[Cisco XG1-V3]], [[Cisco DPC3848]] (V), [[Cisco DPC3939]] :[[Cisco DPC3941B]] / DPC3941TÃ‚ ''(commonly - Comcast Xfinity XB3)'' *[[Compal CH7466]], [[Compal CH7465-LG]] ([[Arris TG2492LG]] / ::''Virgin Media Hub 3'')
*'''[[Hitron]]''': CDA Series: [[Hitron CDA-32372]], [[Hitron CDA-3-35]]; CDE Series: [[Hitron CDE-32372]] :CGN3 Series: [[Hitron CGN3]], [[Hitron CGN3ACR]], [[Hitron CGN3AMF]], [[Hitron CGN3AMR]], [[Hitron CGN3ACSMR]] :CGNM Series: [[Hitron CGNM-2250]], [[Hitron CGNM-3552]]; CGNV Series: [[Hitron CGNV4]]; CGNDM Series: -
*'''[[SMC]]''': [[SMC D3G2408]]; '''[[Samsung]]''': [[Samsung Home Media Server]] *'''[[Linksys]]''': [[Linksys CM3016]], [[Linksys CM3024]], [[Linksys CG7500]]
*'''[[Netgear]]''': [[Netgear CM700]], [[Netgear CG4500]] (TM) :[[Netgear C6300]] (BD - Telstra Gateway Max - Australia) Note: <small>CG4500 & C6300BD that ''Cox Communications'' utilizes are [[Broadcom]] BCM3383 based devices, not [[Intel Puma]] 6/6MG based devices. :There are differing versions of each product with either an [[Intel Puma]] or [[Broadcom]] processor installed.</small>
